titleStmt.title: A dialogue between the French King, and the late King James at St. Germains en Laye: occasion'd by the signing of the peace.
titleStmt.author: James II, King of England, 1633-1701, associated name.
Louis XIV, King of France, 1638-1715, associated name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Baldwin, near the Oxford-Arms, in Warwick-Lane,

notesStmt.note: A satiric dialogue referring to the Treaty of Ryswick.
Item at 2174:11 identified on UMI microfilm "Early English books, 1641-1700" as Wing L3118A (number cancelled in 2nd ed.).
Imperfect: tightly bound, with heavy print show-through.
Reproduction of the original in: Bodleian Library.
